name: Tischendorf 8th Edition (Mark)

provenance.source: Tischendorf, Novum Testamentum Graece, Editio Octava Critica Maior (1869-1872)
provenance.notes: Critical edition notable for its extensive apparatus criticus

notes: Tischendorf 8th critical edition (1869-1872). Public domain. Mark chapter 1 included. Notable for incorporating Codex Sinaiticus readings which Tischendorf himself discovered.
